mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from to_horizon_user
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.select: SELECT u.ID,u.BIRTH_DATE,u.`NAME`,u.TELEPHONE,u.CELLPHONE,u.POSITION,u.SEX,u.ADDRESS,u.WORK_DESC,u.EMP_NUM,d.DEPT_NAME FROM to_horizon_user u,to_horizon_dept d,tor_horizon_user_dept t WHERE u.ID=t.USER_ID AND t.DEPT_ID=d.ID AND d.DEPT_CODE <> '100000' AND u.ID <> 'admin' AND d.DEPT_CODE <> '01'

SELECT u.ID,u.BIRTH_DATE,u.`NAME`,u.TELEPHONE,u.CELLPHONE,u.POSITION,u.SEX,u.ADDRESS,u.WORK_DESC,u.EMP_NUM,d.DEPT_NAME FROM to_horizon_user u,to_horizon_dept d,tor_horizon_user_dept t WHERE u.ID=t.USER_ID AND t.DEPT_ID=d.ID AND d.DEPT_NAME <> '部门导航' AND u.ID= userId
mapper.update: UPDATE tor_horizon_user_dept SET DEPT_ID = deptid WHERE USER_ID = userid
mapper.select: SELECT t1.uid,t1.longitude,t1.latitude,t1.ROA,t2.uname,t2.dept FROM sa_user_logitude_and_latitude t1,(SELECT u.ID,u.`NAME` AS uname,d.DEPT_NAME AS dept FROM to_horizon_user u,to_horizon_dept d,tor_horizon_user_dept t WHERE u.ID=t.USER_ID AND t.DEPT_ID=d.ID) t2 WHERE t1.uid=t2.ID
